subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Rajasthan's Capital and Other Famous Cities
question_en: Which city is the capital of Rajasthan?
question_hi: राजस्थान की राजधानी केंकण्याचे आणि फुमांची जागरूकीनेंत्तंतर आहेत.
explanation_en:
Jodhpur is one of the famous cities of Rajasthan but the capital city is Jaipur. However, Udaipur is another important city in Rajasthan.

The capital city of Rajasthan is Jaipur, not Jodhpur.
